org.garret.perst
Class QueryTest

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          org.garret.perst.QueryTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class QueryTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase

These tests verifies an implementation of the Query interface.
The implementation is created by the following way : 

   storage = org.garret.perst.StorageFactory.getInstance().createStorage()
   Query query = storage.createQuery()

In test are used two simple Persistent classes TestClass and TestClassEx: 

   class TestClass extends Persistent{
       int i;
       String s;
   }

   class TestClassEx extends TestClass{
       int ex;
   }
